subject: [Radiance-general] xyz_rgb.cal
body:
Hi,

I was wondering why the file xyz_rgb.cal is not getting copied into the
binaries' /lib directory but is only available in the source tree. Is it
just forgotten in the make system or is there some reason not to use it?

Cheers

Lars.
